import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "../css/Header.css"; import User from "../images/user.png"; export default function Header() { const [theme,setTheme]=useState("dark-mode"); const changeMode=()=>{ if(theme === "dark-mode"){ setTheme("light-mode") } } useEffect(()=>{ document.body.className=theme; },[]); function lightMode() { var element = document.body; element.className = "light-mode"; } function darkMode() { var element = document.body; element.className = "dark-mode"; } return (
